title: The Lost Swords: The First Triad
description: Contains: Woundhealer's Story / Sightblinder's Story / Stonecutter's StoryYoung Kasimir was the custodian of Stonecutter, the sword which could hew mountains or diamonds with equal ease. But now, Stonecutter has been stolen, and Kasimir must recover it before it causes irrevocable damage.
author: Fred Saberhagen
